header_text: With so much going on in your life, you've been thinking about starting therapy. You find a therapist online, but you are skeptical that a stranger will be able to understand how HD impacts your life. At the end of your first video session, you feel hopeful.

elements.Text: After your first session, you think that therapy might turn out to be...
